about_the_game: Command authority as you dominate the streets with the Tactical Soldier Pack. The Assault Rifle from ‘The Funeral’ and ‘Civil Discord’ missions with its under-barrel grenade launcher will be readily available at each of your apartments. Always accessible, grab it whenever you feel the need to unleash a display of force. Gain 50% bullet damage resistance when the complete armor set is worn.

  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
